name: Moincroft V0.1.0
description:
A rip-off of Minecraft, made for no purpose. 

Name comes from Minecraft, pronounced swedishly.

How to play:
- WASD to move,
- Mouse to turn, (you may need to click first)
- Left click to break a block,
- Right click to place a random block

The site is here. (Note: The site may not work, as it is being edited.

Hope you enjoy!
